long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy-to-use Chrome Tabs Bookmarking Extension.

Bookmarking tabs is as easy as two clicks. Access bookmarked tabs in the extension's popup. Bookmark Tab makes managing bookmarked tabs easier.

✔ Bookmark any opened Tab on Chrome
✔ Add custom names for Tabs to bookmark
✔ Eliminate bookmarking the same Tab twice.
✔ Dark Mode for reducing eye strain and fatigue caused by a bright screen.
✔ Delete Bookmarked tabs with one click
✔ Eliminate the need to pin several Tabs
